content.rendered: Due to overwhelming demand, Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band have added a second show at Estadi Olímpic in Barcelona on June 22. Tickets go on sale Nov. 21 at 10 a.m. CET (4 a.m. ET).

excerpt.rendered: Due to overwhelming demand, Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band have added a second show at Estadi Olímpic in Barcelona on June 22. Tickets go on sale Nov. 21 at 10 a.m. CET (4 a.m. ET).
